Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: MORGANSUPPORT
Reviews.Content: these are great housing for the price. they are kinda cheaply made but they are fine for 9 out of 10 applications. would not use for vandal common areas.

Reviews.Title: Good quality, cheap price, awesome look.
Reviews.Author: adam6979 "adam6979"
Reviews.Content: I needed to put a camera that is meant for indoor use on the outside of the building. This housing is very rugged and I love that the cable goes inside the mount so it is not exposed. These seals up tight and is the lens is very clear. The camera I have has IR or night vision which would reflect in the glass but I simply put electrical tape over the LED's and it is perfect. If later on I need night vision I will just buy an external IR stimulator.

Reviews.Title: Excellent housing enclosure
Reviews.Author: Stefano
Reviews.Content: It arrived so fast. Excellent quality of materials, good structure and no problems. You can't go wrong for the price. It is easy to make it work with my camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Spacious 11.8" interior length, accommodates most camera and lens combinations
Heavy duty weatherproof aluminum housing with mounting bracket for indoor and outdoor application
Cable through bracket protects the camera from vandalism, mount with cable pass-through included
Lockable clasp prevents unauthorized access to camera
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor Weatherproof Enclosure Heavy Duty Aluminum Security Camera Housing Cable through bracket with Mounting Bracket for CCTV Surveillance Camera WH9
